title._content: Image taken from page 90 of 'The Humble Petition and Appeal of Thomas Cliffe, a poor shipwright, inhabiting at Northshields. [The editor's advertisement signed: C. S.]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Humble Petition and Appeal of Thomas Cliffe, a poor shipwright, inhabiting at Northshields. [The editor's advertisement signed: C. S.]" Author: CLIFFE, Thomas. Contributor: S., C. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 1077.f.85." Page: 90 Place of Publishing: Newcastle Date of Publishing: 1845 Publisher: M. A. Richardson Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000725461 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
